mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiries ( title, content, created_at, is_private, view_count, has_reply, user_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{isPrivate}, #{viewCount}, #{hasReply}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: select i.inquiry_id, i.title, i.content, i.created_at, i.view_count, i.is_private, i.has_reply, u.id from inquiries i left join users u on i.user_id = u.user_id order by i.created_at desc LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

select i.inquiry_id, i.title, i.content, i.created_at, i.is_private, i.view_count, c.comment_id, c.reply_content, c.reply_date, u.user_id, u.id from inquiries i left join inquiry_comments c on i.inquiry_id = c.inquiry_id left join users u on i.user_id = u.user_id where i.inquiry_id = #{inquiry_id}
